name: Snake Plant
care_info: Thrives in indirect sunlight and requires minimal watering. Allow soil to dry between waterings.

name: Spider Plant
care_info: Prefers bright, indirect light and well-draining soil. Keep soil slightly moist.

name: Aloe Vera
care_info: Needs bright, indirect sunlight. Water sparingly, allowing soil to dry between waterings.

name: Peace Lily
care_info: Grows well in low light. Keep soil moist but avoid overwatering.

name: Pothos
care_info: Tolerates low light. Water when the top inch of soil is dry.

name: ZZ Plant
care_info: Thrives in low light and requires minimal watering. Let soil dry out between waterings.

name: Monstera
care_info: Prefers bright, indirect sunlight. Water when the top inch of soil is dry.

name: Rubber Plant
care_info: Needs bright, indirect light. Water when the top of the soil becomes dry.

name: Philodendron
care_info: Grows well in indirect light. Water when the top inch of soil is dry.

name: Boston Fern
care_info: Thrives in high humidity and indirect sunlight. Keep soil moist.
